title: I can't update my client
body: When i start updating it, it says unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more informacion. What i have to do? i tried alot of solutions like reinstalling it, but it didn't work. I am stuck like for 3 months now , please help and answer me. Thanks {{champion:157}}

replies.body: It sounds like you're still on the legacy client, and we need to get you updated!  I want to help but need some more info.  At what percent are you getting this error?
